title: PMS 2.0 740 - Thursday Night Football Preview, Coach P's Keys With Chuck Pagano In Studio, Kurt Warner, Von Miller, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: Today's show is absolutely LOADED. Pat, Darius Butler, AJ Hawk, and the boys preview the Thursday Night Football game between the Chargers and Chiefs on Amazon Prime, give their game picks, and unveil a No Sweat Same Game Parlay available exclusively on FanDuel. Joining the progrum in studio to give his keys to victory for both the Chargers (37:13-1:00:28) and Chiefs (1:39:09-2:03:32) in tonight's Thursday Night Game is former Head Coach of the Indianapolis Colts, our Coach, Chuck Pagano. Also joining the progrum to chat about tonight's game, his thoughts on week 1 as a whole, and how difficult it is to balance being the guy and just a guy in the locker room as a Quarterback is Hall of Famer, Super Bowl Champion/MVP, 2x NFL MVP, and Walter Payton Man of the Year, Kurt Warner (1:04:58-1:39:07). Later, 2x Super Bowl Champion, Super Bowl MVP, future Hall of Famer, 8x Pro Bowler, 7x All-Pro, and current Defensive End for the Buffalo Bills, Von Miller joins the progrum to chat about the Bills big week 1 win, what plays the NFL can eliminate to protect top tier pash rushers, and to make a potentially big announcement for the rest of the season (2:03:51-2:23:23). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
